org.jmisb.api.video

Class VideoInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoIO
      • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, IVideoInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VideoFileInput, VideoStreamInput

    public abstract class VideoInput
extends VideoIO
implements IVideoInput
    Abstract base class for video input.
